pr_title: Fix when _parallel option is a variable, workflow fails

timeline.bodyText: We're abstracting accesses to _parallel property by moving related implementations to  ParallelControl. Why don't you move this direct access to _parallel property to the class by adding like ParallelControl#copyIfNeeded(Config src, Config dst)?

replies.bodyText: Thank you for pointing out, that's a really good point! Updated: 8b2915e, 724c1a6.
